actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 with respect to the definition of "air commerce" and "air transportation."

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to include within the definitions of "air commerce" and "air transportation" intrastate air commerce and transportation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 with respect to the definition of "air commerce" and "air transportation."
